name: MoviesDatabase
description: MoviesDatabase provides complete and updated data for over 9 million titles ( movies, series and episodes) and 11 million actors / crew and cast members

parameters.name: info
parameters.description: Info type structure (default: mini-info) -> base_info / mini_info / image /...

constraints.inter-dependency: startYear, endYear: if startYear is provided, endYear must also be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of titles per page (default: 10) -> 10 max
